segments.text: This scene in the kitchen tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so diligently drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflowing unnoticed makes me ache.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water ruining the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle, and it could lead to a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then the children, trying to get cookies so innocently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that shaky stool, so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One fall could change everything for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaching up, full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but the risk is too much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view contrasts this potential sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep sadness watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish I could step in and prevent the heartbreak.
segments.speaker: PAR
